content.text: Match ends, Oldham Athletic 2, Burton Albion 3.
Second Half ends, Oldham Athletic 2, Burton Albion 3.
Corner,  Oldham Athletic. Conceded by Tom Naylor.
Attempt saved. Peter Clarke (Oldham Athletic) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
